title: Asian Stocks to Fall as Tech-Led Drop Gains Pace: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks were set to follow US shares lower as selling in technology stocks gained pace and investors rotated out of the sector and into a broader range of companies.
content: Asian stocks were set to follow US shares lower as selling in technology stocks gained pace and investors rotated out of the sector and into a broader range of companies.
